Body: Description: On a few machines when i open the Client no devices are shown in the device control list.

What We've Learned Updated: I have asked the customer to check either Windows updates or some Root Certificate Authorities that need to be installed on the machines (Global Sign related) as devs suggested.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting on devs to let us know which root certificate to check for.

Next Steps Updated: Cristian will check with Adrian to make sure procedure is correct, before sending it out to the customer.
---
Waiting on devs to let us know which root certificate to check for.
